scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production `npm bin`/tsc && NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp ./static/* dist
scripts.build:test: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=test `npm bin`/tsc && NODE_ENV=test webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp static/ dist
scripts.profile: npm run build:test && (rm *.log || true) && node --prof perf/runPerf.js && (for f in *.log; do node --prof-process $f; done)
scripts.profile:node: npm run build:node && (rm *.log || true) && (NODE_ENV=node node --prof perf/runPerf.js) && (for f in *.log; do node --prof-process $f; done)
